Package ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.fragment

Fragments which the application uses for all functionality.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BowlerFragment.BowlerCallback
    Container Activity must implement this interface to allow LeagueEventFragment to be loaded when a bowler is selected.
    GameFragment.GameFragmentCallback
    Callback interface offers methods upon user interaction.
    LeagueEventFragment.LeagueEventCallback
    Container Activity must implement this interface to allow SeriesFragment/GameFragment to be loaded when a league/event is selected.
    SeriesFragment.SeriesCallback
    Container Activity must implement this interface to allow GameFragment/StatsFragment to be loaded when a series is selected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BowlerFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-13.
    GameFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-18.
    LeagueEventFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-15.
    SeriesFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-17.
    StatsGraphFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-07-20.
    StatsListFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-07-20.
    TutorialFragment
    Created by Joseph Roque on 2015-07-24.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TutorialFragment.TutorialPage
    Possible tutorial pages.
